attributes.action: support creation of local arts directly and indirectly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Eextensive research into the needs of humanity to move forward and balance the needs of all life on planet earth leads to only one conclusion. 
We have to find new ways of RELATING to each other!
This is the solution that will help the government the economy the envoironment and the health of all people.
Promoting local arts is one of the key issues to help this.
I call upon Gordon Brown to lead the way forward and set up a comission to promate local arts as a way of supporting comunities and increasing the health of the nation.
